length

Class Length

  • java.lang.Object
    • length.Length
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Length>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Foot, Inch, Meter, Yard

    public abstract class Length
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Length>
    A Length is an object that has a length and a unit, can be converted to meters, can be added to other Lengths, and can be compared to other Lengths.
    Author:
    Tom Bylander

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Length(double length)
      Store the length in this Length.

      This should return a different String if the length is exactly 1.0.

      Set the length of this Length object.
